=head1 NAME

Lucy::Plan::BlobType - Default behaviors for binary fields.

=head1 SYNOPSIS

    my $string_type = Lucy::Plan::StringType->new;

    my $schema      = Lucy::Plan::Schema->new;

    $schema->spec_field( name => 'jpeg', type => $blob_type );
